mapper.insert: insert into CHATROOM (roomId, userId, roomName, imgurl) values(#{roomId}, #{userId}, #{roomName}, #{imgurl})
mapper.select: SELECT cr.roomId AS roomId , cru.userId AS userId, cr.roomName AS roomName, cr.imgurl AS imgurl, cru.isRead AS isRead FROM CHATROOM AS cr JOIN CHATROOMUSER AS cru ON cr.roomId = cru.roomId WHERE cru.userId != #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE CHATROOMUSER SET isRead = 1 WHERE roomId = #{roomId} AND userId = #{userId}
UPDATE CHATROOMUSER SET isRead = 0 WHERE roomId = #{roomId} AND userId = #{userId}
